summary: This mod adds Imperial Legion and Stormcloak soldiers along the roads of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Imperial Legion and Stormcloak soldiers along the roads of Skyrim. And they are waiting to attack the enemy when they pass by. These ambushes will not appear until the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Civil_War]Battle for Whiterun[/url] and will disappear at the end of the Civil War questline. If you want to know the locations of these ambushes download the game guide.Â This mod works great with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76424/?]Civil War Uniform[/url]. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1023/?]here[/url]

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
